successes.title: Flint and Tinder: Premium Men's Underwear
successes.description: Luxuriously rugged yet refined Premium Men’s Underwear; Sparking a revolution in American Manufacturing the old fashioned way.

Pledges.description: You get our undying gratitude… PLUS: We’ll send you a limited edition set (3 boxes) of Flint and Tinder matches (we're calling them Tinder Boxes) shipped right to your door. Leave ‘em around to let friends and family know you appreciate quality and support America. Together we can spark a revolution.
Hat tip to www.Swiss-Miss.com for the idea!
You get 1 pair of premium men’s BRIEFS, BOXERS, or BOXER-BRIEFS, in the color and size of your choice, shipped anywhere in the US.
BONUS: We’ll throw in a box of matches too.
You get 3 pairs of premium men’s BRIEFS, BOXERS, or BOXER-BREIFS in the 1 COLOR and size of your choice, shipped anywhere in the US.
BONUS: We’ll throw in a bunch boxes of matches too.

NEW OPTION (5/17): 1 SHIRT & 1 PAIR OF UNDERWEAR. 
You get 1 PREMIUM T in the style and size of your choice, plus 1 pair of premium men’s BRIEFS, BOXERS, or BOXER-BRIEFS (trunk length or standard) in the COLOR and size of your choice, shipped anywhere in the US. BONUS: We’ll throw in a some matches too. This is the perfect way to sample a variety of great American-made wears.
You get 7 pairs of premium men’s BRIEFS, BOXERS, or BOXER-BREIFS in ALL 7 COLORS (one of each) in the size of your choice, shipped anywhere in the US.
BONUS: We’ll throw in a bunch of boxes of matches too.
